title: Spanish and Latin American Film
description: Study, analysis, and critique of films from Spain and/or Latin America, organized around such topics as individual film directors or genres, national and international film traditions, migration, gender, ethnicity, and politics. Evaluation of works in their cultural contexts. The Schedule of Classes will list topic selected and language of instruction (English or Spanish). Total credit limited to 8 units. 3 lectures, 1 activity. Fulfills GE C4 except for Modern Languages and Literatures majors.
prerequisites: Completion of GE Area A and SPAN 233 or consent of instructor
